__e: - So Pat's gone in with them, has he?
- No, Pat's all right where she is for now.
We're going to take a little trip. You and Jim... And Pat and I.
Well, Pat and me has been friends a long time.
What's the matter? Well, if it's pat's birthday tomorrow, it's yours, too.
Oh, Pat, come on, Mr. Mason may be many things, but he's certainly not dangerous.
Pat, you mean to say Father hasn't opened a bank account for you?
- Pat, this isn't the time or the place.
- I'm going to tell her that you're here.
My wife's name is not pat at all.
